downloadTitle: System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Windows Server File & iSCSI Services 2016 and above
downloadDescription: System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Windows Server File & iSCSI Services 2016 and above

downloadFile.name: Microsoft SCMP for File and iSCSI Services 2016 and above.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/0/7/a071e8d0-d188-4ed8-8a8c-84dfdc1ac675/Microsoft SCMP for File and iSCSI Services 2016 and above.msi

detailsSection:
This management pack covers the following:
  • DeDuplication
  • FSRM
  • iSCSI
  • NFS
  • SMB
  • Work Folders
  • DFS Namespaces
  • DFS Replication
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft SCMP for File and iSCSI Services 2016 and above.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported SCOM versions
  • System Center Operations Manager 2016, 2019 and 2022
    • To check support of other SCOM versions and Operating systems, please refer links below:

    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2016#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system

    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2019#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system
    https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/system-center/scom/system-requirements?view=sc-om-2022#microsoft-monitoring-agent-operating-system
